Name: The Gaze that Pierces Through Time
AttributesDescription:
Each time dealing Coordinated Attack DMG increases Basic Attack DMG of all Resonators in the team by 12%, stacking up to 10 times for 30s.

This Token can be used up to 2 times in Whimpering Wastes.
BgDescription: "He bent down and picked up the box, salvaged from the wreckage. Its surface, stained with blood, radiated a strange, captivating glow. This eerie luster seemed to beckon him, drawing him away from the tragic aftermath of the crew's violent fights. Without a glance back, he vanished into the depths of the island."
ObtainedShowDescription: Each time dealing Coordinated Attack DMG increases Basic Attack DMG of all Resonators in the team by 12%, stacking up to 10 times for 30s.
